title: Bob's Story of Cats
description:
Based on a definitely true story â€” Bob's Story of Cats is a heartwarming tale of cats doing different things.

Why cats? Because they are the most important animal on the planet and we should all be more like them. This film is a celebration of cats and their many talents. It's a must-watch for anyone who loves cats, or anyone who doesn't love cats but should.
author: Bob Bobson
